article_metadata.news-keywords: Novant Health, Franklin Medical Center, closing, hospital, Wake, Franklin, county, Louisburg, rural, NC, North Carolina
article_metadata.description: Novant Health announced Wednesday that it will close the Franklin Medical Center, Franklin County’s only hospital, on Oct. 16 because not enough people are using it.
article_metadata.title: Novant Health will close Franklin Medical Center | News & Observer
